channel.title: EconomyPK Beta (Read)
channel.description:
[img]http://bankhead-network.com/files/ad.PNG[/img]
This is just an advertisment for the BETA server, all features are yet to be completed.
I have been hiring a few coders to fix some bugs, and implement features that I cannot do myself.
Yes, I am paying certain people to code my source
[code] C_R_O_O_K_S :: Paid $20 usd to fix a few bugs, and add a few small things Empty spot :: $120 USD remaining for coders to work on my source[/code]
Why? : Im in it for the fun, not in it for the money or the 'best server'.. I just want to provide a fun pk server
I dont want to be flamed just because your server is better than mine, so please show some respect. :|
Current features implemented so far are : [code] Basic Clan System Basic Party System Many training areas, good wilderness places setup Portals (Travel to and from places) A couple of vulnerabilitys fixed so far (not completely) A good bit of npc's to try and test 3 Custom Armour sets, including 2 handers[/code]
Every new player for the first week will recieve a starters package + have 3x normal exp. The current EXP rate is 95x so that we can recruit a few players.
Website can be found in my sig, and we are hiring mods.
Thanks for reading, this topic will be updated as development continues. <3 Joe

This is just an advertisment for the BETA server, all features are yet to be completed.

I have been hiring a few coders to fix some bugs, and implement features that I cannot do myself.
